mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (product_id, product_name, category, price, description, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{productId}, #{productName}, #{category}, #{price}, #{description}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET product_name = #{productName}, category = #{category}, price = #{price}, description = #{description}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE product_id = #{productId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = #{productId, jdbcType=BINARY}
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID AS 'productId', PRODUCT_NAME AS 'productName', CATEGORY, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_AT AS 'createdAt', UPDATED_AT AS 'UpdatedAt' FROM PRODUCTS
